patthana16.35:1.1: Sekkhaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasekkho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.35:2.1: Sekkhaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasekkho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
